title: [BUG] SkiaSharpDemo: trophy.json file missing
body:
**Description**

SkiaSharpDemo should display a trophy lottie file. But does not.

The file is completely missing from this maui demo app.

Also, adding a file N times (to the N platform folders) is not ideal. Using an embedded resource loader instead in the SKLottieImageSourceConverter would fix this nonsense.
